abstract: The S.E.C.’s whistle-blower program faces challenges on several fronts. | Apple will more than double its program to return cash to shareholders. | The hedge fund manager Marc Lasry will not be moving to the United States ambassador’s mansion in Paris. | The S.E.C. has been flooded with calls to require publicly traded corporations to disclose political donations.
snippet: The S.E.C.’s whistle-blower program faces challenges on several fronts. | Apple will more than double its program to return cash to shareholders. | The hedge fund manager Marc Lasry will not be moving to the United States ambassador’s mansion in P...
lead_paragraph: The use of whistle-blowers at the Securities and Exchange Commission has proved effective. A tipster bolstered an investigation into a trading blowup that almost took down Knight Capital; another aided the discovery that Oppenheimer & Company had overstated the performance of a private equity fund; and a whistle-blower helped the government pursue a Ponzi scheme in Texas, Ben Protess and Nathaniel Popper report in DealBook.

abstract: Investors seem to be starry-eyed about Amazon’s valuation, particularly when compared with Apple’s.
snippet: Investors seem to be starry-eyed about Amazon’s valuation, particularly when compared with Apple’s.
lead_paragraph: And people wonder why it’s hard to understand the stock market.

headline.main: Comparing the Valuations Behind Amazon and Apple Shares
